chapter.text: When earth is shaken in her [final) quaking
and earth throws forth her burdens
and everyman says: "What is [happening] to her
on that day she will report her news
which your Lord has inspired her with
On that day men will appear in droves to be shown their actions
and whoever has done an atoms´ weight of good will see it
while whoever has done an atom´s weight of evil will see it
